title: Pre-existing type errors in widget and server test files
issue: During TKT-060 verification, discovered 48 pre-existing TypeScript errors in test files across widget (22 errors) and server (26 errors) packages. These were introduced by recent commits ea324cb and 69ed232 that added test files. Errors include: possibly undefined objects, unused variables, type assertion issues, and missing properties. These cause both `pnpm typecheck` and `pnpm build` to fail.
suggestion: Create a dedicated ticket to fix all test file type errors. Priority should be medium as these don't affect runtime but block CI/CD. Consider: (1) Fix type assertions and add proper null checks, (2) Remove unused variables, (3) Update test mocks to match type definitions, (4) Consider adding `// @ts-expect-error` for intentional test violations with explanations.
